statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ -1 \\ -1 \\ -3 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ -2 \\ 3 \\ -4 \\ -1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 26 \\ 9 \\ -1 \\ 23 \\ 17 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -24 \\ -11 \\ 9 \\ -25 \\ -13 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
